name: Divine Dragonic Empire of Brittania
startIntroPart1: You are the emperor of Brittania, the king of kings, the divine dragon of balance.
startIntroPart2: Make the world your empire. Make the kings of this world bow down to you. For you are the incarnation of the dragons of Brittania.
declaringWar: You are worthy to join under my empire. Be my subject and serve me well.
attacked: I am disappointed, nonetheless, I will welcome you under my banner.
defeated: I may have failed but that does not mean it is my end, for you are my heir. Whether you want it or not, you inherited my will.
introduction: I, Argus Pendragon, welcome you to my empire. Conduct yourself as you are in the presense of the king of kings.
neutralHello: I have acknowledged your presense, now speak.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak, and I shall hear it.
neutralNo: I forbid you to speak about this matter again.
neutralYes: Perhaps you are not as dumb as I thought.
hateHello: And here I was wondering what was that repulsive presence I felt.
hateLetsHearIt: You are permitted to speak but watch your words.
hateNo: You are as I thought you are, a savage.
I commend you for thinking I would agree just because I have listened to your words.
I am surprised at how bold of you to ask such thing.
hateYes: How surprising, your words are making sense.
afterPeace: You and I know this would not last for a long time, but very well. Build your army and I will do the same.
tradeRequest: I see no reason for you to refuse. Accept it.
unique: The Dragons of Brittania has blessed this civilization
